title: Beef Stock Concentrate
directions: Place meat into mixing bowl and mince 5 sec/speed 7. Set aside.
Place mixed vegetables and fresh herbs into mixing bowl and chop 10 sec/speed 5. Scrape down sides of bowl.
Add rock salt, red wine, bay leaf, whole cloves and reserved mince meat and cook 25 min/varoma/speed 2 with MC removed and TM basket on mixing bowl lid.
Remove TM basket, replace MC and beldn 15 sec/speed 7, scrape down sides of bowl and repeat.
ingredients: 300g mixed vegetables (eg celery stalk, carrot, onion, garlic, tomato)
4 sprigs fresh herbs of choice (eg basil, parsley, sage, rosemary, tarragon)
